channel.title: Education on B.USOC - Belgian User Support and Operations Centre
channel.description: Recent content in Education on B.USOC - Belgian User Support and Operations Centre

item.title: Space Pole and B.USOC 2018 Open doors
item.author: social_media@busoc.be (B.USOC)
item.description: Saturday 29 and Sunday 30 September 2018 , B.USOC and Space Pole in Uccle (Brussels) opened doors to the public. People saw a little operations centre with timeline , tools example and videos of ASIM and FSL project. B.USOC team was available to explain and reply to questions about B.USOC and projects : FSL and ASIM. The models of SOLAR, ASIM and GEOFLOW of FSL were exposed.

item.title: B.USOC 15 years Open Doors 2014
item.author: social_media@busoc.be (B.USOC)
item.description: The Belgian Institute for Space Aeronomy turns 50 years : Open Doors are possible on 11 and 12 October 2014. The BUSOC hosted by BIRA participates also at the event. The BUSOC will propose to read the comicbook of the TOSCA project and activities about projects of BUSOC (original in english and translation in french) The B.USOC also turns 15 years. At this occasion, a a game book FR - NL ( corrections in French and Dutch ) has been created covering the most important projects in which B.

item.title: Space Pole Opendoors
item.author: social_media@busoc.be (B.USOC)
item.description: Saturday 25 and Sunday 26 may , Busoc and Space Pole in Uccle (Brussels) opened doors to the public.
